<small>Aramaic form: [[H5260]]</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסַךְ‎</span> **verb** ==pour out== (Late Hebrew ***id., pour, cast*** (metals, Pi\`el ***make libation***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נסך‎</span> ***cast*** gold or iron [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>323 f.</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְסַךְ‎</span> ***make libation***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pour out***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, originally ***be-pour, water*** [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xii (1887), 719</sup> (rare), usually ***worship*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>3032</sup> (compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 213; 2d ed. 229</sup>), i.e. ***pour out*** blood of victim, ***pour out*** wine [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2, 114, 118, 142</sup>; — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסַךְ‎</span> [[Isa.29.10|Isa 29:10]]; [[Isa.40.19|Isa 40:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסָ֑ךְ‎</span> [[Isa.44.10|Isa 44:10]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְּכוּ‎</span> [[Hos.9.4|Hos 9:4]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְּכוּ‎</span> [[Exod.30.9|Exod 30:9]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִנְסֹךְ‎</span> [[Isa.30.1|Isa 30:1]] ***Participle Pass.*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְסוּכָה‎</span> [[Isa.25.7|Isa 25:7]] — 

**1.** ***pour out***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> (the spirit of deep sleep) [[Isa.29.10|Isa 29:10]]. 

**2.** ***pour out libations***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶסֶךְ‎</span> [[Exod.30.9|Exod 30:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַסֵּכָה‎</span> [[Isa.30.1|Isa 30:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַיִן‎</span> [[Hos.9.4|Hos 9:4]]. 

**3.** ***cast metal images***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּסֶל‎</span> [[Isa.40.19|Isa 40:19]]; [[Isa.44.10|Isa 44:10]].

**Piel** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַסֵךְ‎</span> [[1Chr.11.18|1Chr 11:18]] ***pour out as libation***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ליהוה‎</span> (= [[2Sam.23.16|2Sam 23:16]] Hiph\`il).

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסִּכוּ‎</span> [[Jer.32.39|Jer 32:39]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּסֵךְ‎</span> [[Gen.35.14|Gen 35:14]] + 2 t.; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַסִּיךְ‎</span> [[Ps.16.4|Ps 16:4]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַסִּיכוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.20.28|Ezek 20:28]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסֵךְ‎</span> [[Num.28.7|Num 28:7]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסֵּיךְ‎</span> [[Jer.44.17|Jer 44:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסֵךְ‎</span> [[Jer.7.18|Jer 7:18]] + 3 t.; ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַסֵךְ‎</span> [[Jer.44.19|Jer 44:19]]; [[Jer.44.25|Jer 44:25]] ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 309</sup>); — ***pour out libations***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶסֶךְ‎</span> [[Gen.35.14|Gen 35:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Kgs.16.13|2Kgs 16:13]]; [[Num.28.7|Num 28:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span> [[2Sam.23.16|2Sam 23:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ליהוה‎</span>; elsewhere, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְסָכִים‎</span> to other gods [[Jer.7.18|Jer 7:18]]; [[Jer.19.13|Jer 19:13]]; [[Jer.32.29|Jer 32:29]]; [[Jer.44.17|Jer 44:17]]; [[Jer.44.18|Jer 44:18]]; [[Jer.44.19|Jer 44:19]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.44.25|Jer 44:25]]; [[Ezek.20.28|Ezek 20:28]]; [[Ps.16.4|Ps 16:4]].

**Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֻסַּךְ‎</span> ***be poured out***, [[Exod.25.29|Exod 25:29]]; [[Exod.37.16|Exod 37:16]], of holy wine, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְ‎</span> of vessels. 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==set, install== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nasâku, id.,***</u></abbr> whence ***nasîku, prince***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 472</sup>; see also [[BDB#M-A|Muss-Arn]]<sup>Hebraica. vi. 89. R. 17 and references</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסַכְתִּי מַלְכִּי עַלצִֿיּוֺן‎</span> [[Ps.2.6|Ps 2:6]] ***I have installed my king upon Zion***. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסַּכְתִּי‎</span> [[Prov.8.23|Prov 8:23]] ***I was installed*** (of Wisdom).
